mapper.select: select a.APP_ID as appId, b.NAME as name, b.ID_NO as idNo, b.MOBILE as mobile, a.TOTAL_FINANCE_AMT as totalFinanceAmt, a.PERIOD as period, c.REMAIN_CAPITAL as remainCapital, c.REPAY_STATUS as repayStatus, d1.DICT_DATA_NAME as repayStatusDesc, c.PROCESS_STATUS as processStatus, d2.DICT_DATA_NAME as processStatusDesc from T_APPLY a left join T_APPLY_TENANT b on a.APP_ID = b.APP_ID left join T_GENERAL_LEDGER c on a.APP_ID = c.APP_ID left join SYS_DICT_DATA d1 on c.REPAY_STATUS = d1.DICT_DATA_CODE left join SYS_DICT_DATA d2 on c.PROCESS_STATUS = d2.DICT_DATA_CODE where 1=1 and a.STATUS = 'sqdzt13'
